channel.title: Music
channel.description: NPR Music features, streams, live concerts and music news.

item.title: Singing The Praises Of Pre-Dawn Walks
item.description: Winter Morning Walks, an album featuring jazz composer Maria Schneider and soprano Dawn Upshaw, revolves around meditations on nature and beauty by former U.S. Poet Laureate Ted Kooser. All three artists have had battles with cancer — when, Schneider says, "everything in life becomes heightened."
item.content:encoded:
Winter Morning Walks, an album featuring jazz composer Maria Schneider and soprano Dawn Upshaw, revolves around meditations on nature and beauty by former U.S. Poet Laureate Ted Kooser. All three artists have had battles with cancer — when, Schneider says, "everything in life becomes heightened."

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: First Listen: Kurt Vile, 'Wakin On A Pretty Daze'
item.description: The laid-back Philadelphia guitarist has become something of a patron saint for the Great Recession's legions of accidental bohemians, who work hard while hardly working. Vile's transfixing new album is arguably his best yet.
item.content:encoded:
The laid-back Philadelphia guitarist has become something of a patron saint for the Great Recession's legions of accidental bohemians, who work hard while hardly working. Vile's transfixing new album is arguably his best yet.

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: First Listen: Villagers, '{Awayland}'
item.description: Villagers' Conor O'Brien has a great gift for songs that almost always turn something on its head. On {Awayland}, he mixes thoughtful approachability with an assortment of trips down more surprising side roads.
item.content:encoded:
Villagers' Conor O'Brien has a great gift for songs that almost always turn something on its head. On {Awayland}, he mixes thoughtful approachability with an assortment of trips down more surprising side roads.

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: Chic Gamine: The Girl-Group Sound, Stripped To Its Bones
item.description: Call it minimal Motown: The Canadian band is four singers, a drummer — and that's it.
item.content:encoded:
Call it minimal Motown: The Canadian band is four singers, a drummer — and that's it.

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: Bridging Arabic And Western Music With An Unusual Instrument
item.description: Classically trained Lebanese trumpeter Ibrahim Maalouf has played with everyone from Sting to Salif Keita. While most trumpets have three valves, his has four, allowing him to play the quarter-tones that characterize Middle Eastern music and the "blue notes" of jazz.
item.content:encoded:
Classically trained Lebanese trumpeter Ibrahim Maalouf has played with everyone from Sting to Salif Keita. While most trumpets have three valves, his has four, allowing him to play the quarter-tones that characterize Middle Eastern music and the "blue notes" of jazz.

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: Phil Ramone, A Record Producer Who Made Simplicity Sound Sublime, Dies
item.description: In making classic albums by Bob Dylan, Paul Simon, Stan Getz and Joao Gilberto, Phil Ramone's greatest talent as a producer and engineer may have been finding ways to make songs sound the way the musicians wanted.
item.content:encoded:
In making classic albums by Bob Dylan, Paul Simon, Stan Getz and Joao Gilberto, Phil Ramone's greatest talent as a producer and engineer may have been finding ways to make songs sound the way the musicians wanted.

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: Music Producer Phil Ramone Dies At 79
item.description: Ramone worked with top artists to create some of the most unforgettable music of our era. He had been hospitalized in February with an aortic aneurysm.
item.content:encoded:
Ramone worked with top artists to create some of the most unforgettable music of our era. He had been hospitalized in February with an aortic aneurysm.

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: Remembering Paul Williams, Founder Of Rock Magazine 'Crawdaddy!'
item.description: Paul Williams started the first American rock magazine as a college student in 1966, and pioneered a style of intelligent music writing from a fan's perspective.
item.content:encoded:
Paul Williams started the first American rock magazine as a college student in 1966, and pioneered a style of intelligent music writing from a fan's perspective.

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: Jace Clayton Revives A Forgotten Voice From New York's Vanguard
item.description: Even among experimentalists like Philip Glass and Steve Reich, the composer Julius Eastman stood out: black, gay and politically provocative. Clayton's new album is a tribute to the singular artist who burned out too early.
item.content:encoded:
Even among experimentalists like Philip Glass and Steve Reich, the composer Julius Eastman stood out: black, gay and politically provocative. Clayton's new album is a tribute to the singular artist who burned out too early.

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: In South Africa, A Reggae Legacy Lives On
item.description: Lucky Dube, the best-selling South African reggae singer of all time, was murdered during a carjacking in 2007. Now his 27-year-old daughter, Nkulee Dube, is African reggae's newest hope.
item.content:encoded:
Lucky Dube, the best-selling South African reggae singer of all time, was murdered during a carjacking in 2007. Now his 27-year-old daughter, Nkulee Dube, is African reggae's newest hope.

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: Pharis And Jason Romero: Appalachia From British Columbia
item.description: The husband-and-wife duo have a real knack for bringing old-timey folk songs to life. Watch them fingerpick and harmonize their own "Long Gone Out West Blues" for Folk Alley, recorded live at Folk Alliance International in Toronto, Ontario.
item.content:encoded:
The husband-and-wife duo have a real knack for bringing old-timey folk songs to life. Watch them fingerpick and harmonize their own "Long Gone Out West Blues" for Folk Alley, recorded live at Folk Alliance International in Toronto, Ontario.

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: Marches Madness: Rubbing Aladdin's Lamp
item.description: Carl Nielsen could have used a little more luck after he composed stunningly original music for a theatrical version of the Aladdin story. The director cut and jumbled the score. But in the end, the Danish composer rescued his music by turning it into a popular suite.
item.content:encoded:
Carl Nielsen could have used a little more luck after he composed stunningly original music for a theatrical version of the Aladdin story. The director cut and jumbled the score. But in the end, the Danish composer rescued his music by turning it into a popular suite.

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: Calexico On World Cafe
item.description: Tejano-loving indie stars Joey Burns and John Convertino visit the World Cafe studios for a four-song set.
item.content:encoded:
Tejano-loving indie stars Joey Burns and John Convertino visit the World Cafe studios for a four-song set.

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: The Women In Charge Of The Band
item.description: Musicians like Lil Hardin Armstrong, Carla Bley and Mary Lou Williams didn't just make it in the historically male-dominated field of jazz: They were the driving forces behind their own bands. Hear five pioneering examples of women who composed for and directed their own groups.
item.content:encoded:
Musicians like Lil Hardin Armstrong, Carla Bley and Mary Lou Williams didn't just make it in the historically male-dominated field of jazz: They were the driving forces behind their own bands. Hear five pioneering examples of women who composed for and directed their own groups.

» E-Mail This     » Add to Del.icio.us

item.title: First Watch: Efterklang, "The Ghost"
item.description: Efterklang, the Danish band who recorded its latest album in a ghost town, makes a video that centers around a ghost story that connects lives across generations.
item.content:encoded:
Efterklang, the Danish band who recorded its latest album in a ghost town, makes a video that centers around a ghost story that connects lives across generations.
